message: Accept and we can split the money now, or we can play another round and risk losing value to inflation.
Let's split it evenly. This way we both get the maximum amount before inflation kicks in.

We're running out of time. This offer gives you a substantial share, while still allowing me to get something. Accepting this will be better for both of us in the long run.
